mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ssp_report ( app_id, media_id, ssp_adslot_id, ssp_price, adx_adslot_id, adx_price, return_success_num, DATETIME ) SELECT a.app_id, a.media_id, a.ssp_adslot_id, a.ssp_price, a.adx_adslot_id, a.adx_price, b.return_success_num, DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) FROM (SELECT ssp.id ssp_adslot_id, ssp.price ssp_price, adx.id adx_adslot_id, adx.floor_price adx_price, app.id app_id, app.media_id FROM adx_adslot adx, ssp_adslot ssp, adslot_relation ad, ssp_devicegroup d, ssp_app app WHERE ad.ssp_adslot_id = ssp.id AND ad.adx_adslot_id = adx.id AND adx.state = 1 AND ssp.status = 1 and ssp.ssp_devicegroup_id = d.id and d.ssp_app_id = app.id) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT r.ssp_adslot_id, r.adx_adslot_id, SUM(r.return_success_num) return_success_num FROM adx_report r WHERE r.date_day = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY r.adx_adslot_id, r.ssp_adslot_id) b ON a.ssp_adslot_id = b.ssp_adslot_id AND b.adx_adslot_id = a.adx_adslot_id
